/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The street is flanked by towering buildings and lush greenery, creating a harmonious blend of urban and natural elements. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the vastness of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and grass contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky and the gray of the buildings.
